data.oai_dc:dc: This file converts the raw data in Actual_Size_Data.csv into a size distribution for each site and year, standardizing for survey area and survey effort in each year. See GitHub link for further meta-data and any updates. https://github.com/jwilsonwhite/IPM_statespace/tree/master/Kimbro_etal_Oikos
